ValidationRule.description: If Reassign Category 1 = Employer Contribution and Reassign Category 2 = Profit Sharing Allocations, then Reassign Category 3 and 4 should be required before the case can be saved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), RecordType.Name = 'Service Support 401k/S125 Case', ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_1__c , 'Employer Contribution'), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_2__c , 'Profit Sharing Allocations'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_3__c , ''), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_4__c , '')), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_4__c , '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to save case, please enter a Reassign Category 3 and Reassign Category 4
